nodes.text: The Blinged-out clone trooper were specialized clone troopers in the Grand Army of the Republic.

Their armor, as indicated by the name, was given metallic gold patterns and also was lined with small amounts of diamonds. The emblem for the Galactic Republic was located on the chest. Owing to the gold-colored nature of the armor, blinged-out clone troopers also carried a special gold-colored rifle.
The blinged-out clone troopers were a special uniform given out during the Halloween Trick or Treats event in 2010, and later were a purchasable uniform in 2011.
